item.title: How Compass Turns Questions Into Queries

item.title: Your Data Team Shouldn't Be a Help Desk: Use Compass with Your Data
item.description: Compass now supports every major data warehouse. Connect your own data and get AI-powered answers directly in Slack, with your governance intact and your data staying exactly where it is.

item.title: When (and When Not) to Optimize Data Pipelines
item.description: Engineers often optimize the wrong parts of their pipelines, here's a profiling-first framework to identify real bottlenecks and avoid the premature optimization trap.

item.title: Orchestrating Nanochat: Building the Tokenizer
item.description: Every great model starts with great data. This first part walks through how to structure ingestion with Dagster, prepare your text corpus, and build a tokenizer that shapes how your model understands the world.

item.title: Dagster + Atlan: Real-Time Asset Observability in Your Data Catalog
item.description: Automatically sync asset materialization events and lineage from Dagster Cloud to Atlan

item.title: Orchestrating Nanochat: Deploying the Model
item.description: Once the model is trained, the final step is getting it into usersâ hands. This guide walks through turning your model into a fast, reliable RunPod endpointâcomplete with orchestration and automated updates from Dagster.

item.title: Data Ingestion Patterns: When to Use Push, Pull, and Poll (With Real Examples)
item.description: A practical guide to choosing between push, pull, and poll data ingestion patterns. With real Dagster code examples to help you build reliable, maintainable pipelines.

item.title: How to Build a Data Platform That Actually Scales
item.description: Most teams build data platforms reactively when you should be architecting one that scales with your business, not against it.
